Tests for rendering a document's link references in markdown.
-- simple --
A document.

[foo]: u
-- want --
A document.

[foo]: u
-- sorted --
A document.

[foo]: u1
[bar]: u2
-- want --
A document.

[bar]: u2
[foo]: u1
-- interleaved --
First.

[foo]: u1
Second.

[bar]: u2
-- want --
First.

Second.

[bar]: u2
[foo]: u1
-- titles --
A document.

[r1]: u1 (title1)
[r2]: u2 "title2"
[r3]: u3 'title3'
-- full reference link --
[First][foo]

[foo]: u1
-- collapsed reference link --
[foo][]

[foo]: u1
-- shortcut reference link --
[foo]

[foo]: u1
